lead_paragraph: A brief article in some editions on Thursday about the collapse of a George Mason basketball player who sustained a concussion during a game misstated the team’s nickname in some copies. It is the Patriots, not the Colonials.
snippet: A brief article in some editions on Thursday about the collapse of a George Mason basketball player who sustained a concussion during a game misstated the team’s nickname in some copies. It is the Patriots, not the Colonials.
